sn35.71:4.1: “Yo hi koci, bhikkhave, bhikkhu channaṃ phassāyatanānaṃ samudayañca atthaṅgamañca assādañca ādīnavañca nissaraṇañca yathābhūtaṃ nappajānāti.
sn35.71:4.2: Avusitaṃ tena brahmacariyaṃ, ārakā so imasmā dhammavinayā”ti.
sn35.71:5.1: Evaṃ vutte, aññataro bhikkhu bhagavantaṃ etadavoca:
sn35.71:5.2: “etthāhaṃ, bhante, anassasaṃ.
sn35.71:5.3: Ahañhi, bhante, channaṃ phassāyatanānaṃ samudayañca atthaṅgamañca assādañca ādīnavañca nissaraṇañca yathābhūtaṃ nappajānāmī”ti.
sn35.71:6.1: “Taṃ kiṃ maññasi, bhikkhu, cakkhuṃ ‘etaṃ mama, esohamasmi, eso me attā’ti samanupassasī”ti?
sn35.71:8.1: “Sādhu, bhikkhu, ettha ca te, bhikkhu, cakkhu ‘netaṃ mama, nesohamasmi, na meso attā’ti evametaṃ yathābhūtaṃ sammappaññāya sudiṭṭhaṃ bhavissati.
sn35.71:8.3: jivhaṃ ‘etaṃ mama, esohamasmi, eso me attā’ti samanupassasī”ti?
sn35.71:10.1: “Sādhu, bhikkhu, ettha ca te, bhikkhu, jivhā ‘netaṃ mama, nesohamasmi, na meso attā’ti evametaṃ yathābhūtaṃ sammappaññāya sudiṭṭhaṃ bhavissati.
sn35.71:10.3: manaṃ ‘etaṃ mama, esohamasmi, eso me attā’ti samanupassasī”ti?
sn35.71:12.1: “Sādhu, bhikkhu, ettha ca te, bhikkhu, mano ‘netaṃ mama, nesohamasmi, na meso attā’ti evametaṃ yathābhūtaṃ sammappaññāya sudiṭṭhaṃ bhavissati.
